content.detailedDescription: I've been a calif civil engineer, number 23123, for many years.  during summer break of 95 or 96 i worked for pge on a traveling survey crew.  one monday morning i left san francisco very early to drive to work in oakhurst/bass lake.  my route was south on i5 then i cut east thru the central valley somewhere in vicinity of merced.  sun rays (sunrise) were appearing over the sierra nevada mtns to the east, not a cloud in the sky.  no aircraft visible.  then a very bright object rose very suddenly from behind the sierra nev mtns to an elevation of about 5 degrees above the horizon.  then it stopped and hovered for few seconds.  then it sped off to the s-se in a wavering path.  it's path was perhaps 5 degrees upward.  it seemed to disappear into space, not over the horizon.   it showed no signs of acceleration in that it went from zero to very very fast in an instant.  the speed at which it left my sight was incredibly fast and was "hypersonic".  a human being could not have survived the movements of the wavering path, and nothing man-made could have moved that fast, at that time or even today.   the object appeared to be quite distant from me when i first saw it, and it appeared to rise from "behind" the sn moutains.  because of the distance it must have been quite large, in fact very large.  at the time i judged it's distance to be a very long way from me, like in excess of 30-40 miles.  the size of the object was not as large as the moon but was perhaps 3-5% of the size of the moon in the sky.  it certainly wasn't just a light and it certainly wasn't an airplane. nothing man made could move as suddenly or could be as bright or as large as this very bright object.  no pulsations, just a very bright object that i was able to observe.  i don't recall having sunglasses on at the time, but probably wasn't wearing them because the sun was not visible yet.   i don't remember the exact date or year, but should be able to come close via social security records. if i was to guess the year i'd say 1995.  the day would be hard to pin down.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright object raised suddenly over distant sierra mtns, hovered, then sped away

content.detailedDescription:
1. giant eagle parking lot, placing groceries into my car.

2. noticed a single bright red orange light ascending from behind the horizon (tree line).

3. at first i thought it was an airplane departing cleveland hopkins, then the second light appeared, then the third. then i thought it must be helicopters, but there was no noise and no beacons or navigation lights.

4. the object(s) appeared from behind the treeline and ascended straight up maintaining equal distance from each other. as they reached what i believe to be the cloud base the vanished without any light reflecting from the clouds.  the last light turned white and vanished.  within a few seconds a disc shaped  object appeared and moved to the east vanishing into the clouds. 

5. at first i had no reaction as the third light appeared i called out to other people in the parking lot to look. after eliminating all possible logical explanations, i was...Curious. when the disc showed up i was kind of shaken but still amazed.

6. the three lights vanished into the clouds, as did the disc but moving in a different direction.
content.summary: Three ascending lights followed up with disc sighting.

content.detailedDescription: Looked up to see a bright red "star" almost over head. at first it is a steady luminosity just a bit brighter that the stars around it. i looked at the time on my phone for reference.  watching it in relation to other stars showed that it was stationary for around 5 minutes.  then it slowly began to move in a northerly direction for a minute or so starting to change intensity.  pulsing and winking. then it vanished.
content.summary: Red star - stationary for 5 minutes then moves

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home at approximately 9:00pm on saturday 9/10/11 on state route 86 (easy street) from saranac lake new york toward route 30, my partner and i were having a conversation, a pretty in depth conversation.  while she was in mid sentence she said "what are those lights".  dismissive i tried to look to see what she was talking about (and still drive at the same time at 55mph) but did not notice anything and told her that it was a plane.  my partner was insistent that what she was seeing was no plane or planes but bright, moving, and color changing objects. she then told me to pull over.  we pulled over into an area that use to be farmland and was now being turned into a housing development (no houses built) located near paul smith's new york on state route 86 (easy street).  i kept the car running thinking we were going to be seeing nothing out of the ordinary when we took a closer look, and i asked her what she had saw?  she told me she saw three bright objects, changing color, with movement.  the objects (which i thought were stars) were very easy to notice as there was not a cloud in the sky and the moon was unusually bright.

i evaluated the brightest object that was located to my right and was assuming it to be a planet.  i did not witness any of the color changes that she was witnessing for that object.  i then looked for the second object that she had seen, in the middle, but was no longer there.  i then turned my attention to the third object that was more star-like and had significant changes in color.  thinking it was just the light passing through our atmosphere to produce the "twinkle" that i see with stars, we continued to watch.  the object then, slowly, started to move to the left across the sky (approximately moving two inches or more).  the object then quickly returned to the point of origin and stood still, but showing dramatic color changes from white, red, orange, blue, green, gold (not so much yellow).  the colors did not blend together, they were distinctly and independently visible.  thinking it was an issue with light passing through my windshield, i turned the car off and went outside.  i continued to see the object move from its point of origin, slowly, to the left, then quickly to the right.  thinking i was moving, i propped myself up against the car and found a stationary reference point (2) one being a pair of foot-hill mountains with a valley between, and the second being a stationary star that was slightly lower and to the objects left.  

using these two points i continued to watch the object move in this same pattern; however, unexpectedly the object made a dramatic move (of what seemed like a change of altitude) then rush quickly to the right, and rise back to original point of origin.  at this time i used my phone to google "moving star" and "reporting ufo in new york", and it brought me to the mufon webpage and two phone numbers for new york.  i got back into the car and called the first number and woman answered (i felt horrible because of the time of night) i asked if this was the number for mufon and she quickly put me on the phone with the mufon representative. 

my partner and i began to explain what it was we were seeing, provided him with basic location and direction (to the best of our ability).  we had been told that the first, brightest object might be a star named spika or pika(spelling) which is the brightest star in the sky.  the object to our left was now our main area of concern.  the object was much higher than the brightest object (now known to be a star).  i explained all the information that i had written above, and he asked me to approximate the degree of elevation (i was not able to do this very well).  he asked me if the object was star-like, which i confirmed it was.  he asked me about the approximate size and i stated that it looked smaller than an aspirin, i stated that it was; however, after the incident i can say that was approximately the size of a low dose aspirin.  he then asked me to use my thumb as a tool of measurement.  the object was staying true to its area of motion and went past was i would approximate four thumbs to the left, and shot back quickly to the right.  as we continued to talk, the object would move left, shift right quickly, begin its color change, and start over again.  during the incident, we did notice the traditional blinking lights of a plane that would fly near the object; however, distance was very hard to determine.  my partner described the object as being like a kite (in terms of its movement) meaning that it was moving but yet looked like as if it were attached to a string.  this steady state of movement took a sudden change and began to almost move in a circular pattern, but taking very sharp turns.  after taking the up the gentleman's time for about 20 minutes (or more) he asked us if we could make a report on the mufon page.  i agreed and ended our phone call.

my partner and i continued to watch the object for an additional 10-15 minutes, and as we were about to leave, the object seemed to change its movement cycle again and do more of a "figure eight" type pattern.  my partner became emotionally uncomfortable and we left the location.

opinion-

i do not think this is an object of any origin outside of our own means.  we do have military aircraft that occasionally fly over our area, but never like this.  i also vaguely remember a news article which stated that the military was using the adirondack region to practice controlling uavs.  

i dismissed the object's potential as being a satellite as i see them nearly every night from my back yard.

there could be a possibility that it is some sort of law enforcement aircraft trying to find unusual ground temperature which could indicate someone attempting to grow marijuana.  

what i cannot potentially explain is the speed and acceleration.  i think the acceleration is more unexplainable, plus the acceleration with change in what i think was altitude and then direction.

we are stumped.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving star-like object with control

content.detailedDescription:
Morning wakeup. put on the coffee. opened the frontroom picture window blinds for daylight and schocked to find mysterious white image on the glass and its size and erie look to it. overwhelmed my senses how hellish looking it was...That face! had to document this mystery so grabbed my only camera (digital) and took various angle photos trying to gain a dark background for better imaging to its whiteness. went outside and checked ground below pw. found nothing. not even a crack in the 72"wide by 60" high size glass.
so over-powering this image was on me i sought out a major tv store with large size lcd screens. asked technician if he could take my sim card from camera and bring these mystery photos up on the high resolution screen. it was schocking! so evil looking. more schocking was jawbone "teeth". also estimated wingspan about 6-8 feet. other veiwers gaspped in horror. i was then schockingly convinced i had a unique close encounter with some type of ufo species. who do i turn too now?
went home and told story to neighbor. neighbor then confided in me his wife was schocked by something evil she saw. both our backyards border a cemetery. about dusk time while in backyard she heard an unusual loud wing flapping noise and looked up and saw "it" flying at her as she bolted into her home. they didn't want to tell anyone in fear of "your crazy". that truely told me not to drop this story but put it into the hands of special investigators.
footnote: life's path has taken me into the realm of the institute of parapychology of duke university. wow,what a rabbit hole,expedition and journey into higher consciousness of the biggest picture. many fascinating coincidences and synchronisitys but much needs to be focused on this story and photos attached...Please.
content.summary: Overnite white image  found on living room picture window one morning.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i may have seen ufo���s this evening in darien, ct.

approximate time was 8:45pm est

we witnessed approximately 10 (we didn���t think to start counting until a few had gone by) flying objects from a vantage point on the shore of darien ct looking northeast.  the craft were traveling in groups of 2-3 heading from the northeast towards the south (towards nyc).  they appeared to us as bright orange lights.  

we/i did not see any strobe lights or any green or red wing tip lights, which are commonly seen on commercial aircraft in the area (we see aircraft coming and going from laguardia, kennedy and white plains).  the craft were travelling south, but turned to what appeared to be the northwest and disappear (the bright orange lights no longer visible).  the craft emitted no sound (however there was an on shore breeze blowing in towards the direction of the craft).

the craft appeared to fly at the same speed as commercial aircraft in the area.  what caught our attention was that they were traveling in pairs (or 3���s) and had a distinctive bright orange ���head lights���.  we assumed they must be fighter jets coming to participate in 9/11 activities���but the fact that they made no sounds and all turned to the northwest and not on over nyc seemed strange.
content.summary: Bright orange lights traveling in pairs from the northeast haeding south, then changed direction to northwest

content.detailedDescription: While walking our dogs on 5th street in hampton, va., at approximately 8:15 pm on september 10, 2011, my mom and i observed what at first appeared to be a falling star.  my mom even commented, "look! is that a falling star?"  as it came closer into our immediate field of vision, probably not more than a mile from us overhead, it just stopped moving and hovered above the trees.  it appeared as a glowing red/orange ball of light, i can best describe it as resembling a "fireball."  it remained stationary for just a few minutes and then began to move west at a very slow pace.  it slowly ascended higher until it was completely out of sight and just disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange/red light observed hovering, no noise, and then ascended until disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch with my wife and 2 friends when one of our friends interrupted the conversation by saying what the he'll is that. i turned around in my chair and we all viewed a bright amber orange colored light heading in what appeared to be our direction. i watched for maybe 10 seconds and then ran into the house to get my binoculars. i could hear my wife and her friends out front from inside and they were excited. after grabbing the binoculars from inside i made it back out to the front porch and the object had dropped behind some trees but i could still make out the light through the branches. i don't believe the object dropped to tree level but from our vantage point it was behind the trees. my wife and her friend informed me that just the few seconds i was inside the object had descended rapidly behind the tree and began to glow even brighter than before. i witnessed the object ascend back to a higher altitude and moved in several directions. with the binoculars i could see a bright light at what appeared to be the bottom of the object and from the glow of the light it seemed to have a ballon shape or teardrop shape above the light. the object seemed to dim and get bright multiple times and after about 2 minutes it shot away at an incredible speed. i thought the object just dimmed out at first but when i brought the binoculars back up i could still see the object but it was much further away. shorty after it disappeared. the object made no sound that we could tell and there wasn't a lot of background noise in the area that would make it hard to hear. we see slot of airplanes in our area but this was no airplane.
content.summary: Orange color light hovered about 500ft off the ground and moved and hovered multiple times. object also became real bright at one point and then dimmed down. object shot away at an incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: At first one appeared and then two more about 20 min later. all three were blinking green, red, white, yellow, and orange lights randomly and they were also in a triangular formation east of greenville, texas. i have been watching for three hours now and they have not moved. at around 2am three more objects appeared west of the first three also blinking the same color lights and also in a triangular formation.
content.summary: Witnessed 6 objects in the sky binking white green, red, yellow, and orange lights in a triangular formation for the last three hours. started around 1 am east of greenville, texas.

content.detailedDescription: I heard a ufo sighting on the police scanner so i went outside to see if i could see anything. i grabbed my binoculars and saw a star like object very high and far away but over where we had a bad fire a few days ago. the object was blinking red, green yellow, white and orange lights and never moved from where i first saw it. then about 20 min later i saw another object to the left of the first sighting that also did the same thing and then another one appeared. they were in a triangular formation. all of this was east of greenville, texas. i have been watching for about an hour and 45 min and they are still in the same place and have not moved. i have never seen anything like this in my life.
content.summary: Starlike,green,red,yellow,white,orange blinking lights. sighted three in triangular formation, stationary. lights would get very bright and blink then dim and get bright again. i have been watching for about 1hr and 30 min. and the objects have not moved

content.detailedDescription:
Witness did not want any of his information written up due to his job in the community, witness contacted state chief investigator after his shift and explained what he saw, gave me permission to tell what he saw but again no private information is to be used.

witness states during his shift as a law enforcement officer, he exited his cruiser at 5:15 am on september 10, 2011. as he got out he looked up about 80 degrees he saw the first light, he noticed a jet aircraft in the area heading towards rochester international airport, the object was traveling faster than the jetliner, when the object got at 90 degree (directly overhead) the object disappeared, he states this could be due to the lights in the area and anything past the 90 degree would be affected by the night lights. about 30 seconds later another light appeared at about 75 degree, flew directly overhead and continued in a s/e direction, the light was much brighter than the first, as this light flew overhead, a 3 light came into view, from the south heading in a northerly direction, they looked like they might collide but didn���t, there were 3 very bright stars out and the objects flew between these 3 stars.

report written by chief field investigator stephen cox.
content.summary: Saw 3 lights traveling faster thans jets in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on north hwy 465 before exit 65 i was driving.I thought it was a light off of another car but it was not. saw one round ball like object in the air.It was a dull white light.Saw just one at first then saw about 12 all stuck togather. i have never saw anything like this before.
content.summary: Round ball like objects over road.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the back balcony talking on the cell phone when a large symmetrical disc shaped object on the horizon between two radio towers was pointed out to me by a friend. i am knowledgeable about many types of civilian and military aircraft and at first thought we were seeing a c5 galaxy heavy usaf transport coming directly toward our location. after another look i realized that the craft lacked definition sufficient to be identified as the craft above, then realized that it lacked most definition. the object on the horizon then began to move laterally to the right of my field of view. i raced to my vehicle after trying to take picture from my balcony did not work well, and began to travel in the direction the object was located in. as i closed in with the object, being able to see only brief glimpses here and there as the area is hilly, i noticed it had begun travelling away from me in the same direction of travel that i was moving. it was lazy and lethargic looking in its movement yet i could not catch up with the object. there were no other aircraft in the area, and the object began to pick up speed as it moved over the susquehanna river several miles from my home, then pitched up without changing geometry and went into some clouds where i lost site of it. only one very blurry image of this was captured on my camera unfortunately. on the way home, there was a huge amount of air traffic including several private light craft in the cessna 150 category, a couple commercial airliners in the 737 range and a pair of yf-22 interceptors moving at great speed at approximately 1,000 ft. above the ground which flashed by very quickly in the direction the object went in. all the aircraft were heading in that directing as well.
content.summary: Flat shaped silvery disc bilaterally proportional hovered or direct tword me path then moved laterally then away

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving to her house from town and she lives in the middle of no where.. we look up and see 6 bright, hovering, diagonal lights in the sky. as we proceeded to drive it was exactly above us at one point, and it still didn't move. the lights weren't unusually bright but it was weird that the object just stayed in one place and didn't move at all.
content.summary: My friend and i were driving to her house and we look up in the sky and see a hovering object with 6 diagonal lights.

content.detailedDescription: It was around. 9:20 in the evening when me and 3 of cousins were grilling outside i noticed an orange light in the sky flying i would say in a southeastern direction. we seen it get bright then fade then brighten again. we live close to dulles airport where planes frequently land and take off, but this was no airplane for sure. the light did not flicker like an airplanes strobe light . and we could also see that it did not fly in a straight path. we watched it move across they sky for a good 2-5 minutes then as a plane in the sky approached, it just disappeared
content.summary: Orange orb flying in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Two other witnesses   took video and photos from iphone   dad was  airforce    nothing like anything ive seen
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 searate ufos   2 took same path   laser beam   and rapid ascent straight up

content.detailedDescription: It was the scariest think i have ever seen. there was so many of them in the sky i thought we was under a ufo apocolips. they was triangle shaped and they was glowing. we have four or five eye witnesses that live on our street. they was about half a mile up in the sky. we got them on video , on a phone and a video camera.We just pulled in our drive way and my mother said whats that in the sky and thats when we first seen them.We knew it was a ufo when we first seen it.They was just floating and moveing slowely.They went really fast and we lost them. we ran and got the camera and went for it.
content.summary: Alot of ufos. they was glowing

content.detailedDescription: I was standing by my window and green laser looking lights stated flashing outside. then i went outside and didn't see anything.
content.summary: Flashing green lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house, we went into the back yard. it was between 9:30 and 10:00 pm. it was not completely dark out yet but dark enough that stars could be seen.  my friend went back into the house to get a drink, i was looking up at the stars.  i saw movement to my left so i looked up, thinking it was a commercial jet, and could see the craft coming from the north flying very fast.  i watched as it flew overhead, it was flying as high as jets.  it appeared to be huge, it was boomerang shape,  it was grey in color and appeared to be translucent at times.  it had dark circles underneath it, and looked like it had smaller circles on the leading and trailing edges.  i saw no lights at all, no collision lights flashing like on jets or any illumination.  it made no sound and there was no contrails.  it flew in a straight line. i watched it for about 20 seconds before it flew above the clouds to the south.  my friend did not make it out in time to see it.
content.summary: Grey boomerang  shape

content.detailedDescription: Was walking my dog in leominster, ma. looking in the sky because of previous experiences, i saw a starlike ufo approximately 1,000 ft. in the air to the east of me traveling at a high rate of speed for about 5 seconds, then took off in about one second and dissappeared. when the ufo took off it looked like a comet or a shooting star and dissappeared. this happened at approximately 8:50pm to the east of leominster mass. and was heading north.
content.summary: Starlike ufo high rate of speed then took off like a comet and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
On 8th september, 2011 at approximately 9.00pm, myself and 3 other people observed a very large orange light in the sky hovering over the mountains near apple valley - about 20 miles from where we were.  i ran inside to get the video camera.  on my return, there were 6 or more orange lights in a triangular pattern.  they were only there for a matter of seconds and i got a little bit of video footage.  unfortunately i did not have a tripod set up and was having trouble locating the lights in my view finder.  this was a very similar sighting to my report about the orange lights over the george airbase last month.

we estimate the lights were about 1000 feet from the ground over the lower part of the apple valley mountains.  considering we are nearly 20 miles from this area, the footage gives an indication of the size of the craft.
content.summary: Orange lights in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Dog woke me up barking.Let dog out and looked at stars from porch as i often do. i noticed a very bright star behind a tall pine tree. i often watch visible planet straight off path way wondered if it moved to different location or was another planet because it was so bright, than it moved out from tree and stayed for a short time.Wondered if it was a helicopter.It continued to move closer and i waited to see if i could hear sound of helicopter as it came closer. i was only out for 14 minutes and as it came closer it stayed just about treeline i could not hear any noise.Thought to myself fiance watching too many ufo shows.After telling him he suggested i check out mufon website, i was amazed to see there was a case number that explained exactly what i had just explained to fiance. i was never a believer or a non believer. the other stars were not very bright because of the moon phase. my dog also barks every time she is let out. but she made no sound on this night.I watched until it was on other side of residence out of sight.
content.summary: Appeared like planet but closer and brighter tree linestopped and moved slowlycloser with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work at mehrabad airport.  i was in the usaf at the time working at the mac terminal and was an aircraft mechanic with  14 years of experience on many types of aircraft.  i had just turned west on the access highway to the airport and was about halfway between the shahyad monument behind me and the eastern access road to the airport ahead.  as i pulled into the left lane to set up my turnoff i saw directly ahead crossing 90 degrees left to right, a cylindrical object right at the top edge of my windshield at an altitude of maybe 150 feet.  it was daylight and a clear morning.  the location meant to me that this object had just flown across the eastern end of the main runway which runs parallel to the highway.  at first i thought someone had accidentally fired a missle again (it happened a year earlier) because the rear of the cylinder looked like a blunt multi-port propulsion system of some sort and had a faint exaust resembling steam comming out.  i quickly realized it had no fins, no wings, a blunt front, and was flying much to slow; hardly fast enough even for a small plane.  i pulled over to the left shoulder so i could get out and look.  my thought now was that a helicopter must be hauling this pipe-like thing somewhere.  but, no helicopter and no noise.  two other cars had pulled over in the right lane and watched as i did.  the object maintained a northward direction staying just above ground level and away from the residential area of northwest tehran.  we could actually watch the item for about 5 minutes until it went past a rolling ridge just short of the mountain range which borders north of the city.  i waited for another minute expecting to see an explosion or smoke or something, but nothing happened.  i continued on to work, told what i had seen and had inquirys made of all agencies both military and civilian.  no one had seen anything and no reports were filed.  i found this very hard to believe but since i was in my last days there and getting myself ready to be reassigned back to the states i didn't bother to take the time looking for the location that i suspected it might have impacted.  i want to make it clear that this was in october of 1975 and not 1976 when they had the larger ufo incident which also included a cylindrical object.  the other witnesses were local iranians and we just looked at each other after the incident and went our separate ways.
content.summary: Slow moving, stable, aerodynamically impossible, no flight controls or wings

content.detailedDescription: Just arrived home and happened to look up noticing a strange light resembling a star(there were no stars out at this time). i told my 3 friends who i was with and grabbed my camera to film it. upon zooming in on the object i noticed it was three lights in a triangular arrangement, it made no noise and was completely motionless but after filming it for a few minutes its lights dimmed and seemed to get fainter until we lost sight of it.
content.summary: 3 dots of light in the southern sky 2 miles outside of aztec, nm.

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing to you to inform mufon of a rock art site (rochester creek utah) that is a definite native american depiction of a ufo crash site and possible alien recovery operation. i can send along pics of the site (petroglyphs) with my notes attached. i have been a student of rock art for over 30 years and have visited over 300 sites. i would like these pics to be submitteed to someone at mufon that knows and has experience in this area as this is very hard evidence and can be readily studied. i am concerned that the site could be comprimissed through a rush to the site by the public.

awaiting your reply so i can send along these images/report.
content.summary: 700 year old petroglyph (fremont culture) depicting ufo crash site

content.detailedDescription:
Lanaii is a small island close by maui.  i was driving to work one morning. there was no moon showing (it could have been overcast - i do not recall) as it was very dark.  i was headed toward the ocean, going down a winding road.  there were no trees or structures in the way.
the object was quite large and just seemed to pop up over the ocean
and just as quickly pop - was gone. it was so big you could not miss it.
i had no idea what is was and still wonder if it ever happened to any one else at another time. i was very calm and not at all threatened.  by pop up, i mean it was just there for a moment or two and it just wasnt there.  it did not move.
content.summary: Large, shimmering (like jello) orangy and stationary. appeared and disappeared very quickly

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i had decided to have a small fire at a place called farmers beach.  it is down a gravel road and sits right next to the lake of clear lake.  i happened to bring some binoculars and my camera because the last time we were there, we saw 4 other ufos.  we arrived at farmers beach to find that we had the place to ourselves at around 8:20 (estimated)and started a fire.  it was a somewhat clear night but the stars weren't as visible as they usually are. at around 8:45 i looked up towards the south to see a few glowing lights moving, one of them being blue.  i quickly grabbed my binoculars to check it out.  the objects were miles away and when i looked at the object it appeared to be a moving white light with a blue glowing trail behind it.  immediately excited i grabbed my camera and snapped my first picture at 8:55.  in the picture were three white odd shaped objects that were somewhat in a triangle pattern.  i was very intrigued by them since i had three on one picture, they have a somewhat cross like shape to them.  at 9:01 i snapped another one.  this one is eery and sends chills up and down my spine.  the details that i am describing are coming from my camera as the naked eye would have just seen lights and shrugged it off possibly. when zoomed in on this picture, it almost appears to be a planed with a ring around it.  within the next minute it just disappeared and i do not know how.  after this, i just started snapping pictures in the direction that i saw these objects in the sky in hopes to catch something.  at 9:08 i caught what looks to be an object with three lights, one in front and on each side.  this object was being followed by a small white orb.  these orbs have shown up by these objects in almost all of my pictures.  eight minutes later, i had a picture with 7 similar glowing white, cigar like shapes.  one of them almost looks like a space shuttle with an orangish glow emitting from the bottom. the weirdest one in this photo has a vertical glowing white light along with a horizontal one towards the bottom of the object, almost like an upside down lowercase t.  when i zoom in, this object also has a blue and sort of orangeish light on it, exactly diagonal from each other. the friend that i was with witnessed it all happening too, although he was more interested in the fire. my pictures speak more than my words as these are hard to describe. the objects were in the sky for maybe thirty minutes, i cannot explain how they appeared and disappeared, they just did. later that night at 2:45 am, when i was back in town at a friends house i had decided to snap a picture of the stars so i could compare with my zoomed in images.  not one star appeared in the photo but to my surprise there was a straight line that was illuminated.  i definitely did not see this before the photo.  in my photos, most of them look just like lights until zoomed in once again as they were so far away. total, i caught maybe twenty on my camera, adding up in the multiple photos.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Cross,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Very odd, different colored objects and shapes, glowing lights in sky. somewhat hard to see with the naked eye.  multiple white glowing objects,  it's hard to describe.

content.detailedDescription: I began noticing what appeared to be a bright star out of my window, high in the sky over jersey city from the 20th floor of my apartment in tribeca.  it was a bright star-like light. i noticed that the light was pulsating so i kept and on it and it started to move diagonally.  it would hover in the same place then suddenly make short, quick diagonal movements.   on occasion it seemed to change colors, red mostly.   the first night i saw it i watched intensely.  it very slowly made its way north, as if it was surveying manhattan from afar.  it would hover for an hour, making its diagonal movements and then when i would look up an hour later it would be further north.  i had many people tell me it was probably a weather ballon or satellite or something like that.  the diagonal movement was odd though and i don't know how you could explain that.    anyhow, i kept an eye on the sky and the thing was showing up every night anywhere between 11am and 1am and doing the same thing.  i finally got used to it.  perhaps it is a military surveillance, but i wouldn't be surprised if it is a ufo.  i'd be happy to show someone where it is and would appreciate if anyone can explain what it is.  i moved in june, but it was there every night.
content.summary: Distant pulsating star like object that hovered over jersey city making short, quick diagonal movements, appeared in the same area every night and made a northern path as if surveying manhattan from about midnight - 5am

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10 at night. we were inside and saw a giant fireball in the sky. we ran outside and saw it flicker. we saw it for about two minutes. it flew in a straight path and was very quiet. it was low enough to be a plane, but if it was we would have heard something.  all i know is that i have never seen anything like it. it was really weird!
content.summary: It was glowing like a giant fireball in the sky. it was quiet, and stayed in view for about two minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i usually take 2-4 "trudges" @ night each week.  i always observe the stars and watch for meteors, etc.  on august 27th we started out a little later then usual, about 9:45pm we were walking south on state route 42, just outside of the house when we saw what i assume to be the i.S.S. going over head west to east, very bright in the west fading out to the east.  i have seen the space station go over before and that is the only object that i know of which behaves in that manner & is that bright.  we continued to walk turning on to schmidt rd. then to eckert rd. heading to the pebble creek golf course, where we have permission to walk the cart-path. safer then walking on the roadside @ night.  we were walking towards the green, on hole #2 (westward) when we both noticed the lights moving from the brightend sky area towards lexington (appearing from behind the treeline) and moving parallel to the horizon southward (west of our position). the light/s were pulsing, there was one light high to the right, another light low to the left of the 1st, very close together.  i assume they were on the same craft.  there was no noise, and the night was quiet.  usually we can hear cars on the sr42, or planes when they are in the sky.  there was no sound with this craft.  it moved quite fast.  the lights seemed to be about as bright as would be seen if someone about 200yrds away were flashing halogens in your direction on and off.  the upper light would flash on then dim and as it dimmed the lower light would come on, then back to the upper light.  if it was an airplane i have never seen that pattern of lighting.  i always watch any unsual lights i see in the sky to see if they display normal aircraft flashing lights this did not change light patterns even though its position to us was quite different from when we started to watch it to where it left visual range.

on other occasions i have noticed 3 lights in triangle formation moving from either north to south or south to north, about the same brightness as satalites.  which i assumed they were, even though normally i have only viewed solitary satalites and normally they are going east - west.
content.summary: My friend and i saw unusual lights moving north - south just above treeline
